kizuna_language_b_01:
[BD06:0][trnm:0]! I’m in a bit of a
pinch![npcn:26]
kizuna_language_b_03:
This Pawmi really doesn’t seem to be feeling well!
I don’t know if the poor thing can even stand up!\r
What should I do? What should I do?![npcn:26]
kizuna_language_b_04:
Oh, right! I could use a Potion! Do you have any
on you, [trnm:0]?[npcn:26]
kizuna_language_b_05:
You don’t?! Ahhh! What should I do? What
should I do?!\c
Waouh! Hold on—I had exactly one Potion in
my pocket![npcn:26]
kizuna_language_b_06:
This’ll fix you right up, my friend! Potion
power, GO![npcn:26]
kizuna_language_b_07:
Phew. That seems to have done the trick just in
the nick of time![npcn:26]
kizuna_language_b_08:
But this Pawmi doesn’t appear to belong to a
Trainer. Hmm... Could a wild Pokémon have\r
wandered onto the academy grounds?[npcn:26]
kizuna_language_b_09:
Still, I can’t just leave it here alone without
anyone to make sure it’s OK.[npcn:26]
kizuna_language_b_10:
It’s decided, then! I, Salvatore, will just have to
lend all of the helping hands I have to take care\r
of Pawmi in this touch-and-go situation![npcn:26]
kizuna_language_b_system_01: You became even closer with Mr. Salvatore!
